resources.string: Opens zoom screen. Zero zoom value means zooming by width.
Rotates document to the 90 degree clockwise. Long click rotates counterclockwise. Navigation buttons swaps according to rotation.
Opens borders crop screen. Long click for plus or minus in this dialog changes crop value for 30. Negative value add additional borders.
Go to next page. On long click opens page chooser screen.
Go to prev page. On long click opens page chooser screen.
1. Open document (zoom by width by default)
2. Select appropriate orientation: portrait or landscape
3. Crop borders, text size will be changed accordingly to changing borders (if zoom by width specified)
Click on screen - go to next page, long click - go to prev page.
